item.title: Introduction to Bayesian Power Analysis: Exclude a Null Value
item.description: Recently, I have been thinking a lot about data-driven decision-making, particularly in the context of experimentation. Why? I am uncomfortable with the common practice of using p-values and frequentist null hypothesis significance testing to make decisions. I donâ€™t feel confident about the approach. I think it is because I do not get it. For instance, when I am forced to explain the definition of a confidence interval precisely, it does not come naturally.
